summary: in the heart of a machine
title: in the heart of a machine
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2MX2wUW

by GremlinGirl

Armitage Hux works at the largest tech company in the country, and he has big plans for the future of First Order Tech. When a strange person, only going by their username KYLOREN, contacts him, he uncovers something slightly more sinister than a simple publicity stunt.

Words: 16367, Chapters: ½, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars Sequel Trilogy
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Armitage Hux, Kylo Ren, Phasma (Star Wars), Finn (Star Wars), Snoke (Star Wars)
  • Relationships: Armitage Hux/Kylo Ren
  • Additional Tags: Sci-Fi, Texting, Technology, Technobabble I barely understand myself, i don’t wanna give away a lot in the tags, Possibly Disturbing Language, Slight hints at a type of abuse, text, room, Heart, kyluxxoxo, Week 7

blog.name: ao3feed-starwars
blog.title: Star Wars AO3 Feed
blog.description:
An AO3 Feed for the Star Wars - All Media Types tag.

Icon from the Star Wars App.

title: Ripples in the Force
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2MUI1YY

by maiar1025

Every person has a destiny, the fixed result of their actions and choices. Fate is an action a person makes which is mandatory for their destiny to be realized. How will the fated meeting of Jedi Knight Harry Potter and Queen Amidala of the Naboo sweep across the destiny of the Galactic Republic? These movements of fate are the Ripples in the Force.

Words: 11282, Chapters: 2/2, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of Movements of the Force

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling, Star Wars - All Media Types
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Harry Potter, Padmé Amidala, Anakin Skywalker, Obi-Wan Kenobi, Qui-Gon Jinn
  • Relationships: Padmé Amidala/Harry Potter
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Harry Potter Setting, The Force, Magic, Movie: Star Wars: The Phantom Menace


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2MUI1YY

blog.name: philosopherpig67
blog.title: Nothing is written
blog.description: The fault, dear Brutus, lies not in our stars, but within ourselves

summary: So I dreamed I was in Rivendell and for some reason, they were expecting an imminent Death Star attack on Middle Earth. Elrond...
body: So I dreamed I was in Rivendell and for some reason, they were expecting an imminent Death Star attack on Middle Earth. Elrond gave the most bitchin-est double bladed ligtsabre with a mithril hilt and Obi Wan was supposed to train me up. Only we used ordinary sparring sticks in training and when the Empire came someone had stolen my lightsabre. And that’s the story how I lost my dearest possesion that I never even actually held in my hands

And that’s the story how I lost my dearest possesion that I never even actually held in my hands

And that’s the story how I lost my dearest possesion that I never even actually held in my hands

blog.name: elle-lavender
blog.title: Of Radishes and Queens
blog.description: A tumblr old nerd from Australia. I'm white, bi-ace cis lady and writer. You'll find lots Star Wars, Fullmetal Alchemist and Magical Girl content here.  Personal pronouns: she/her  Patreon

tags: and lol at the inquisitor in the bg trying to fight off a big ass monster
summary: Ezra: What happened? I ... feel cold. Kanan: I know, it’ll be okay. Let’s get out of here.  Kanan very gently taps Ezra’s cheek...
caption:
Ezra: What happened? I … feel cold.

Kanan: I know, it’ll be okay. Let’s get out of here. 

Kanan very gently taps Ezra’s cheek to wake him up after the monster rampage he caused, assuring the kid that everything will be okay. He then slings Ezra over his shoulder and carries him back to their shuttle. This scene is just amazing! 

This whole episode is an intense look at Ezra’s fears and Kanan’s attempts to cut through them, but at this moment Kanan feels like he pushed the kid too far too soon. And Ezra does need to deal with the barriers he puts in place to keep people out, something he was gradually working on, but all his issues came back suddenly when he was forced to face the possibility of his parents being alive after years of pushing that thought aside just to survive.

blog.name: ao3feed-theforceawakens
blog.title: AO3Feed-The Force Awakens
blog.description: Fan fiction for Star Wars: The Force Awakens

title: how the turntables
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2w992kp

by rachsw

Rey has freshly graduated from high school and is going to start college in two months, to hopefully become a lawyer one day. After a falling out with her father and being kicked out of her house for the night, she decides to go down to the bar to clear her head. That’s when she meets him. What she didn’t know was that he would be her professor in two months time.

Words: 1789, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars - All Media Types, Star Wars Sequel Trilogy
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Rey (Star Wars), Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Kylo Ren, Leia Organa, Poe Dameron, Han Solo, Finn (Star Wars), Rose Tico, Kaydel Ko Connix, Luke Skywalker
  • Relationships: Kylo Ren/Rey, Rey/Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Rey & Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Rey & Ben Solo
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Modern Setting, Alternate Universe - College/University, Fluff and Smut, Unplanned Pregnancy, Professor Ren, student rey, Teacher-Student Relationship, One Night Stands, Loss of Virginity


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2w992kp

by rachsw

Rey has freshly graduated from high school and is going to start college in two months, to hopefully become a lawyer one day. After a falling out with her father and being kicked out of her house for the night, she decides to go down to the bar to clear her head. That’s when she meets him. What she didn’t know was that he would be her professor in two months time.

blog.description: A tumblr old nerd from Australia. I'm white, bi-ace cis lady and writer. You'll find lots Star Wars, Fullmetal Alchemist and Magical Girl content here.  Personal pronouns: she/her  Patreon

summary: After taunting Ezra about killing his master and his friends, the Inquisitor has to go on defensive once Ezra summons a giant...
caption: After taunting Ezra about killing his master and his friends, the Inquisitor has to go on defensive once Ezra summons a giant monster to his defence. Kanan wakes up just in time to see that Ezra is having a very close encounter with dark side. Yeah, they were in a dire situation, but Kanan realises he may have rushed things with Ezra’s training at this point!

reblog.comment: After taunting Ezra about killing his master and his friends, the Inquisitor has to go on defensive once Ezra summons a giant monster to his defence. Kanan wakes up just in time to see that Ezra is having a very close encounter with dark side. Yeah, they were in a dire situation, but Kanan realises he may have rushed things with Ezra’s training at this point!
